entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
